name: The number of prime factors of Euler phi of the n-th primorial number, counted with multiplicity.
link: Amiram Eldar, Table of n, a(n) for n = 0..10000
program: (PARI) list(nmax) = {my(s = 0, c = 0); print1(s, ", "); forprime(p = 1, , c++; s += bigomega(p-1); print1(s, ", "); if(c == nmax, break));}
author: _Amiram Eldar_, Apr 05 2025
